channel.title: People on Math and Data
channel.description: Recent content in People on Math and Data

item.title: Faculty
item.description: Core Joan Bruna Associate Professor, Department of Computer Science, Center for Data Science and Mathematics (affiliated). Carlos Fernandez-Granda Associate Professor, Department of Mathematics and Center for Data Science. Julia Kempe Professor, Department of Mathematics, Computer Science and Center for Data Science. Qi Lei Assistant Professor, Department of Mathematics and Center for Data Science. Jonathan Niles-Weed Assistant Professor, Department of Mathematics and Center for Data Science.

item.title: PhD/MsC Students
item.description: PhD Students Brett Bernstein (Sept 2014 - ) David Brandfonbrener (Sept 2018 - ) Zhengdao Chen (Sept 2018 - ) Carles Domingo (Sept 2019 - ) Samy Jelassi (Sept 2018 - ) Aakash Kaku (Sept 2019 - ) Tim Kunisky (Sept 2017 - ) Sheng Liu (Sept 2019 - ) Kangning Liu (Sept 2019 - ) Sreyas Mohan (Sept 2018 - ) Karl Otness (Sept 2019 - ) Cinjon Resnick (Sept 2017 - ) Min Jae Song (Sept 2018 - ) Aaron Zweig (Sept 2018 - ) Lei Chen (Sept 2019 - ) Alumni Francis Williams (Sept 2018 - 2021, now NVIDIA) Luca Venturi (Sept 2017 - 2021, now Facebook)

item.title: Postdocs and Fellows
item.description: Jason Altschuler (Sept 2022 - ) CDS Faculty Fellow, Center for Data Science. Vincent Divol (Sept 2021 - ) CDS Faculty Fellow, Center for Data Science. #### [Yossi Arjevani](https://scholar.google.co.il/citations?user=mgVLJ8MAAAAJ&hl=en) (Sept 2019 - ) Postdoc, Center for Data Science; optimization, machine learning. #### [Léo Miolane](https://leomiolane.github.io/) (Sept 2019 - ) Postdoc, Department of Mathematics and Center for Data Science; probability, statistics. #### [Qing Qu](https://qingqu06.github.io/) (Sept 2018 - ) CDS Moore-Sloan Fellow; signal processing, machine learning, optimization.
